articles.author: GERALD IMRAY Associated Press
articles.title: A girl went missing, seizing South Africa's attention. Now her mother is charged with selling her - ABC News
articles.description: The mother of a 6-year-old girl who has been missing in South Africa for nearly three weeks has been arrested and charged with kidnapping and selling or trafficking her daughter
articles.content: CAPE TOWN, South Africa -- The mother of a 6-year-old girl who has been missing in South Africa for nearly three weeks was arrested and charged Thursday with kidnapping and selling or trafficking her… [+2873 chars]
